text:
CHO, one of your key roles will be to ensure that all pregnant women receive the necessary counselling 
either by you at HWC-SHC or through your team members during VHSND, outreach ANC sessions.
All pregnant mothers need to be counselled for the following:
1. Birth preparedness for safe institutional delivery and Schemes and Entitlement for pregnant mothers offered 
by the government
